name: Sreyeesh Garimella
title: FullStack Developer
bio: I am a qualified and professional web developer with five years of experience in database administration and website design. Strong creative and analytical skills. Team player with an eye for detail.

experience.title: FullStack Developer
details: Mainly work with Vue.js for front-end development and Node.js/Express.js for the backend.
Utilize MySQL for database management and design.
Design and develop web apps and dashboards tailored to client needs.
Solve complex development issues and optimize workflows.
Collaborate in Agile teams, contributing both independently and collaboratively.

experience.title: FullStack Developer
details: Developed Javascript productivity plugins for Adobe Creative Suite.
Set up and tailored Shotgrid tracking software to the specific needs of production leadership.
Developed production workflow infrastructure for the company to use Shotgrid, Jira, and Confluence.
Set up Bitbucket for the company to manage the codebase from scratch.
Implemented Vue.js and Node.js solutions for various projects.

experience.title: FullStack Developer
details: Focused on software management for Overwatch 2, World of Warcraft, Diablo IV using Vue.js, Node.js, and Express.js.
Optimized production pipelines with Jenkins and GitLab.
Implemented AWS Cloud Rendering for faster data production.
Utilized Elastic Stack for data retrieval.
Automated workflows with Python and shell scripts.
Collaborated closely with other developers on Vue.js components.

experience.title: FullStack Developer
details: Support staff using Linux while also developing Python scripts for data.
Manage render workflows and pipelines using Jenkins and GitLab.
Monitor infrastructure with Grafana and utilize real-time data for optimization.
Retrieve data for production and stakeholders using Elastic Search.
Developed Node.js and Express.js APIs for data retrieval and processing.

experience.title: FullStack Developer
experience.company: Walt Disney Animation Studios - Burbank, California
details: Create Python tools for production and provide Linux-based support.
Assist in maintaining CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and manage code with GitLab.
Monitor internal networks and data flow with Grafana.
Contributed to the development of Vue.js applications for internal use.
